panels.visual: Wide shot of the ruined cathedral atop Plynach Mountain. Ice-covered stone walls partially collapsed. Grey sky overhead. The party approaches the dark entrance. The atmosphere is deeply wrong - too quiet, too still.
Inside the cathedral. In the center where the altar once stood, a stone bowl sits filled with strange milky liquid that seems to glow faintly. The party examines it warily.
panels.dialogue: Corpium: "That liquid... it refills itself. Watch."

panels.visual: Armando drinks from the bowl, face twisting with nausea. His eyes briefly go white. The others take turns, each growing sicker. Armando clutches his eyes - temporarily blinded.
panels.dialogue: Armando: "I can't see! It burned my eyes!"
